__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# Dataset folder (do not upload large images)
dataset/

# Virtual environment
env/
venv/
ENV/

# Jupyter Notebook checkpoints
.ipynb_checkpoints

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Python log files
*.log

# Trained model file (optional: include or exclude)
4_trainer.yml
